title: The Cigar Authority Welcomes Pete Johnson
itunes:title: The Cigar Authority Welcomes Pete Johnson
description: Cigar rock star Pete Johnson joins the Cigar Authority this week to talk about his brand new cigar, LA VERITE, that is breaking all the rules and has everyone talking! The boys are also treated to a 5 year aged Tatuaje, as well as the infamous cigar that put Pete Johnson on the Map. Dave and Tommy also give you the inside scoop on some new cigars "they" don't want you to know about, Anniversary cigars, concept cigars and trademarks that are being applied for as we speak.
